metadata.title: CVE-2021-47171 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:usb: fix memory leak in smsc75xx_bind Syzbot reported memory leak insmsc75xx_bind(). The problem was is non-freed memory in case of errorsafter memory allocation. backtrace: [<ffffffff84245b62>] kmallocinclude/linux/slab.h:556 [inline] [<ffffffff84245b62>] kzallocinclude/linux/slab.h:686 [inline] [<ffffffff84245b62>]smsc75xx_bind+0x7a/0x334 drivers/net/usb/smsc75xx.c:1460[<ffffffff82b5b2e6>] usbnet_probe+0x3b6/0xc30 drivers/net/usb/usbnet.c:1728

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-151.157~16.04.1').
linux-kvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1109.116~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1121.134~16.04.1').
linux-gcp package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1106.120~16.04.1').
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1078.86~16.04.1').
